author: Mahesh Langa
text:
Anandiben may give importance to MLAs of Saurashtra region, where the party got decimated in panchayat polls

Gujarat Chief Minister Anandiben Patel is likely to reshuffle her Cabinet after ongoing rejig of the State BJP is over.

The putative Cabinet reshuffle will involve induction of new faces having rural connect and background while some prominent members of the Cabinet may find themselves axed in the process.

The organisational restructuring of the party unit and the Cabinet has apparently been necessitated by the party’s rout in the recent panchayat polls in which the ruling party has suffered heavily in Saurashtra and north Gujarat regions. The State goes to polls next year.

Another push factor is the Patidar quota agitation, which is resurfacing after a hiatus.

“After the appointments of new party president and other office bearers, there will be reshuffle in the Cabinet. The Chief Minister has already consulted Prime Minister Narendra Modi and the party president Amit Shah,” said a top source in the government.

“In the proposed exercise, Ms. Patel will seemingly give importance to the MLAs belonging to the Saurashtra region. Saurabh Patel, who holds powerful portfolios such a finance, energy and petrochemicals, mining and tourism, will be stripped of either finance or energy,” he told The Hindu .
title: Gujarat Cabinet to get new faces with rural connect
